description: Trevor found out that his girlfriend had cheated on him, He was furious and wanted to take a nice, relaxing shower. He walked into the bathroom and found his roommate, Ben, about to hop into the shower. Trevor had a great idea and decided he should relax and blow off steam using Ben. He figured Ben's mouth and virgin ass would be perfect to help him forget about his girlfriend. And, surprisingly enough, Ben was up to the task. He gets his ass handed to him and loves every inch and thrust of Trevor's aggressive dick.
title: Booty Call
